data.name: Heldenhammer's Fury
data.description: Prayer of Righteousness now deals (30:225 + 0.25 STR) spiritual damage.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Remove up to 10 ailments, curses, or hexes from your groupmates within 100 feet. Restore 300 health for each effect removed from the target.

data.name: Avatar of Sigmar
data.description: Gain 50 righteous fury. For the next 10 seconds, generate 25 righteous fury per second.

data.name: Bludgeon
data.description: A powerful attack which deals X physical damage to your enemy.

data.name: Breath of Sigmar
data.description: Resurrects a fallen ally with 20% health. For the next 45 seconds, the target will be afflicted with Resurrection Illness.

data.name: Castigation
data.description: A strike that deals X physical damage to your enemy, and an additional Y physical damage over 10 seconds, and causes target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to initiative.

data.name: Charged Fury
data.description: Attacks which generate righteous fury will now generate 10 additional points.

data.name: Cleansing Power
data.description: Purify will now cleanse one ailment or hex from all groupmates within 100 feet. It will not cleanse more than effect per target.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Divine Aegis
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, gain a 1200 morale bonus to armor and 50% reduced incoming armor penetration.

data.name: Divine Aid
data.description: Heals an ally for X points, and an additional Y (high) over 5 seconds.

data.name: Divine Amazement
data.description: For the next 15s, Sigmar's Radiance will deal damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet sending the lifetap to all groupmates. In addition, it will apply Radiant Remedy on up to 9 allies within 30 feet.

data.name: Divine Assault
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, attacking their very spirit and offering it up to Sigmar's will. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing X spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Righteous Fury.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: Heal your target for (1200 + 0.8 WIL). This ability is not effected by healing debuffs.

data.name: Divine Light
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to X damage for each person.

data.name: Divine Mend
data.description: A quick heal that restores X (low) health.

data.name: Intimidating Repent
data.description: Repent will now affect all enemies within 30 feet of the target.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 15 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage.

data.name: Divine Replenishment
data.description: Your group mates within 100 feet become more driven. For the next 10 seconds, they will gain 25 action points a second.

data.name: Divine Shock
data.description: The force of Sigmar's displeasure slams into up to 9 enemies 30 feet in front of you and sends them flying backwards.

data.name: Divine Warding
data.description: Everytime time you use Touch of the Divine, Sigmar's Radiance, Martyr's Blessing, or Twin-Tailed Blow, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 5 seconds which will absorb up to X damage.

data.name: Emperor's Ward
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will become protected by a magical barrier for up to 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Exalted Defenses
data.description: Any time you defend against an attack, your healing abilities will become 20% more effective for 10 seconds. This effect cannot refresh.

data.name: Fanaticism
data.description:
Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% and your chance to parry by 10%, but you can no longer cast Touch of the Divine or Breath of Sigmar.

Purify will no longer dispel effects or grant agility. Instead, it will remove all roots and snares from you making you immune to them for 10 seconds. Cooldown is increased to 60 seconds.

data.name: Rush
data.description: You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 25% for 8 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 8 seconds have passed.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects and your cast times are reduced by 50% and you may not be set back.

data.name: Fueled Fury
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 righteous fury. Tactic cannot trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Life
data.description: Groupmates within 100 feet gain (1020 + 4.2 WIL) health over 15 seconds. You will gain 25 Righteous Fury per second for the duration.

data.name: Greave of Sigmar
data.description: Sigmar's Fist will now also apply (3 * rank) tactic bonus to toughness. Your enemy with take a tactic penalty to strength and toughness for the same amount.

data.name: Hammer of Sigmar
data.description: Deals X physical damage to the target. This ability can only be used on targets below 40% health.

data.name: Hastened Divinity
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Healing Hand
data.description: Heals your target for X points over 15 seconds.

data.name: Judgement
data.description: You call down the holy judgement of Sigmar, dealing X spiritual damage to the enemy.

data.name: Leading the Prayer
data.description: Whenever Prayer Of Devotion heals one of your groupmates, you will also become healed for the same amount.

data.name: Martyr's Blessing
data.description:
You open your soul to Sigmar and become a living force of holy power for up to 3 seconds, as long as you maintain your concentration. Each second, up to 9 allies within 30 feet of you will regain X health, and you will consume 20 Righteous Fury.
All snares are removed on cast and you are immune to them for the duration.

data.name: Penance
data.description: You stagger up to 9 enemies within 40 feet for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're attacked. You will gain X morale for each stagger that is broken.

data.name: Pious Restoration
data.description: You call upon Sigmar to bless everyone in your group within 100 feet, restoring X health over 10 seconds.

data.name: Prayer of Absolution
data.description: You chant a bolstering prayer, granting a (rank * 20) ability bonus to armor to all groupmates within 100 feet for 60 minutes. You can only apply one prayer to the party, but players may be affected by multiple different prayers.

data.name: Prayer of Devotion
data.description: For the next 60 minutes, any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you attacks an enemy, there is a 20% chance that they will regain X health. You can only apply one prayer to the party, but players may be affected by multiple different prayers.

data.name: Prayer of Righteousness
data.description: For the next 60 minutes, any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet hits an enemy, there is a 20% chance they will deal an additional X spiritual damage. You can only apply one prayer to the party, but players may be affected by multiple different prayers.

data.name: Purge
data.note:
Builds 35 Righteous Fury
Target must have a blessing
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one blessing from your enemy and deals X damage.

data.name: Purify
data.note:
Requires 25 Righteous Fury
Target must have an ailment or hex
data.description: You purify an ally, removing one ailment or hex and grant them a (rank * 3) ability bonus to agility for 5 seconds.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: Gain 15 stacks that last for 30 seconds. You gain a 40 morale bonus to strength for each stack. Everytime you use an ability, a stack is consumed and you gain 10 action points.

data.name: Refreshing Radiance
data.description: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 action points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Repent
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Replenishing Strikes
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, you will gain 40 action points. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Shield of Faith
data.description: Increases your chance to dodge and disrupt by 10%.

data.name: Sigmar's Favor
data.description: Any time that you are healed by a direct heal, there is a 25% chance that you will regain 3% of your hit points as well. This can only happen once every second

data.name: Sigmar's Fist
data.description: A blessed attack which deals X physical damage to your target, your defensive target gains a (3 * rank) ability bonus to strength for 20 seconds.

data.name: Sigmar's Grace
data.description: The might of Sigmar infuses everyone in your group within 100 feet, granting a (2 * rank) ability bonus to wounds for 60 minutes.

data.name: Sigmar's Radiance
data.description: You smash into your enemy, dealing X (str) physical damage to them. The power of Sigmar erupts from your weapon, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for Y (wil) health plus 100% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Sigmar's Shield
data.description:
You smash your weapon into your enemy, dealing X physical damage to them. Your defensive target becomes safeguarded by Sigmar for up to 8 seconds, who heals them for Y health each time they're attacked. This effect can happen up to 20 times and you lose 5 Righteous Fury each time it happens.

If you have a great weapon equipped, the effect can happen only up to 10 times and costs 10 Righteous Fury each time.

data.name: Sigmar's Vision
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your enemy and blesses your defensive target for 15 seconds, increasing their chance to parry attacks by 10%. You cannot benefit from the parry but you will always gain 5% block for the duration.

data.name: Smite
data.description: A sweeping blow which deals X physical damage to up to 9 enemies 50 feet in front of you. Builds 15 Righteous Fury for each enemy you strike

data.name: Soulfire
data.description: When activated: deal X physical damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you every 2 seconds. During this time you deal 30% more damage and gain a (9 * rank) morale bonus to weapon skill. This ability will end if used again or if you run of Righteous Fury with which to power it.

data.name: Return Life
data.description: Resurrect your target to 1% health. This effect does not apply Resurrection Illness.

data.name: Supplication
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will convert 30 action points into 30 Righteous Fury every second. If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Touch of the Divine
data.description: Restores X health to all group mates within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Unwavering Faith
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to spirit resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to corporearl and elementatl resistances.

data.name: Vow of Silence
data.description: A powerful strike which deals X physical damage to your enemy and knocks the wind out of them for 4 seconds, silencing them and making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Weight of Guilt
data.description: Deals X physical damage to your target reducing their run speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Spirit of the Heldenhammer
data.description:
You channel Sigmar's spirit through your body in order to heal your target for X every second for 5s. You take X damage every second, and you cannot be healed for the duration.

You will also gain 30% movement speed for the duration if you have a shield equipped.

data.name: Lay on Hands
data.description: Divine Aid is now instant cast and only costs 30 Righteous Fury.

data.name: Absence of Faith
data.description: You call upon Sigmar to curse your enemy dealing X spirit damage. For the next 10 seconds, all healing the target receives will be 50% less effective.

data.name: Twin-Tailed Blow
data.description: Deals X physical damage. You are healed for 200% of the damage dealt in addition to Radiant Remedy.

data.name: Guilty Soul
data.description: Anytime you deal direct, critical damage, your target with suffer an additional X spiritual damage over 6 seconds. This ability will not refresh.

data.name: Unberogen Creed
data.description: Sigmar's Radiance, Twin-Tailed Blow, and Vow of Silence can now strike a target from 30 feet away.
